value: shalom shabbat shalom this is daniel
john leave with the torah with tour
restoration ministries i wanted to
provide one hundred percent irrefutable
proof that the new moon the first day of
the scriptural month begins on the
conjunctive new moon which is when the
moon is completely black it's the only
moment in the month when the moon earth
and sun are in perfect alignment with
each other that is the moment in which
the month begins and i have conclusive
proof if you look in Genesis chapter 1
when Yahweh first made the Sun the moon
and the stars we read and yah made two
great lights the greater light to rule
the day and their lesser light to rule
the night he made the stars also that's
in verse 16 and then in verse 17 and yea
set them in the firmament of the heaven
to give light upon the earth so it's
very clear from the context that he sets
the sun moon stars in the sky at the
same time at the same moment on the same
day the fourth day of the original
creation week well it's very interesting
when we read about the Sun and Moon
being in the sky at the same time the
same moment in the same day you see
scientifically and this is an undisputed
scientific fact the Sun and Moon only
rise and set at exactly the same time
they're perfectly in sync all day and
all night at only one time of the month
and that is on the day of the
conjunction the day of the black new
moon every day after that the moon will
rise and set approximately 50 minutes
after the Sun so on the second day the
day after the conjunction the moon rises
50 minutes after the Sun and sets 50
minutes after the Sun on the third day
after the third day of the month or two
days after the conjunction the moon will
rise a hundred minutes after the Sun and
set 100 minutes after the Sun on the
next day the moon will rise 150 minutes
and so on and so forth until by the end
of the month either 29 or 30 days
depending on the Moon and Sun cycle the
Sun and Moon will once again rise in
sync at the same time and set in sync at
the same time on the day of the
conjunction well here in Genesis chapter
1 verse 17 we clearly see that yah puts
the Sun the moon and the stars in the
sky
all at the same time well the only time
the Sun and Moon could be in the sky at
the same time in sync at the same moment
would be on the day of the conjunction
therefore the only scriptural and
scientific time that the month can begin
is out the day of conjunction of the day
of the Black Moon this is an undisputed
scriptural and scientific fact any other
calendar including Crescent or full moon
or whatever other calendar you want to
use is completely unscriptural this is
daniel john lee with tour restoration
ministries website is wwwspa- are calm
shalom
